website_summaries.verdict: Three different sizes for three times the fun.
pros: Offers surprising durability and high-quality cowhide at a reasonable price
The lightweight latex bladder gives you plenty of responsiveness without sacrificing build-quality
cons: The small model can sometimes arrive misshapen

customer_reviews.title: Overall better quality
customer_reviews.text: Have owned several bags. Ate up a everlast everhide 6x9 in 30 days. The meister speed kills 5x7 is the best bag i have ever hit. Well balanced and good construction. Thicker material than alot of other bags. Ordering another now before they change design to save money👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Better than Everlast/title brands
customer_reviews.text: Heck yeah this is what I’m talking about. Been buying the other two main brands (title/everlast) for years but their quality has really began to suffer. Last everlast bag I bought the bladder was bad from new. FYI the bags on these are latex instead of rubber. Should last longer also. I’ll update on how long this one last
customer_reviews.author: Ross T.

customer_reviews.title: Boxing Gym owner appreciates quality.
customer_reviews.text: Boxing gym owner with 200 athletes. Meister is doing good quality control on their products. Thick leather. Well balanced. Double stitched. Great price. The quality focus is appreciated. Good gear is hard to find. I hope to see double end bags soon.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic speed bag for both quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the medium and small speed bags from Meister. I'm very glad I got both as the workout is quite different from the two. The small is fantastic for getting your speed built up once familiar with your striking. The medium bag provides a considerable amount more resistance building more strength in your punches. I highly recommend both sizes. Some people have expressed concern over the latex bladder leaking down more frequently than the traditional rubber. I have not found this to be an issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: Terry K. Huss

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product Only two things worth mentioning Size a little too small Air seems to deflate faster than I expecting as well. I use it almost every morning and it suits my needs well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny See

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speed bag
customer_reviews.text: After decades of of different speed bags, I went through a number of name brand and after the disappointments ended up with a cheap proforce until the leather was worn through. But this bag blows doors off all of them. I also did own a Cleto Reyes for a short bit, the size was not as described and I sent it back. This bad is built as sturdy and absolutely the most balanced bag I ever owned. Probably buy more for gifts for my students as the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Superb! Built with quality, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Popped this on a swivel immediately after I received it. This thing definitely lives up to its reputation! It’s fast, lightweight and works exceptionally. Made with quality material, this was a satisfying purchase for me! The first bag I purchased from another supplier was really big and didn’t seem to have enough bounce back for me, this one blows that one out of the water. I can definitely work on my speed and coordination now!
customer_reviews.author: Trez GeeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: My first speed bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought the medium size, which has worked out pretty well. I have only had it a couple of weeks and I think the large would be too easy. Well made, real leather, smells great. I do have to fill it before use every day. Tried some silicone lube on the air inlet and it didn’t help. It only takes 30 seconds so I’m not too put out. I’d still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Keene

customer_reviews.title: Responsible company!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small bag after using a medium from another company that was too slow. The first bag I ordered failed and only held air for 5 minutes. I contacted the company and they immediately shipped me another bag without question. This new bag has lasted over a month now with teens and adults hitting it regularly. Good speed for those who are skilled enough to get a rhythm but are recreational users who hopefully will never enter a ring. My 5 stars is for the company as much the product. Good people! I put a picture with my hand nearby at nearly equal focal length for size comparisons.
customer_reviews.author: MKS

customer_reviews.title: awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: great bag for the money, well balanced, holds inflation, symmetrical and good response, NO STUPID TEXTURED LOGOS that some bags that cost twice as much seem to design in which is stupid because then you HAVE to wear wraps, this is a great bare knuckle bag which is so important for developing pinpoint accuracy
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Turned out to be a lot smaller than I thought it would be. Still, a good bag.
customer_reviews.text: Still a good bag. Don't buy the ones at big 5 sporting goods from everlast anymore. They all died within a month. Got tired of returning them. The bladders and the leather laces break without much wear at all. This bag is a high quality. I recommend this companies products.
customer_reviews.author: Hannibal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fast, great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Real leather. Very nice sturdy bag. They are useful in training. Don’t forget to slightly deflated It after you’re done working with it . Very happy. I am a beginner, therefore I purchased the biggest one, I am planning now to buy small the fastest one Meister bag since my confidence increased.
customer_reviews.author: leonid yankulin

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. WAY better than Title garbage. Inflation hole seems to stay in place. That was the problem I had with the old bag. As it lost air, the bladder shrank up and disappeared into the bag and I couldnt inflate it anymore. I dont think this one will do that. I got the smallest size and Im pretty good at using a speed bag , so I like it. But its SMALL. If you arent sure, go with the next size up. The leather seems like it is great quality and will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: jmc305

customer_reviews.title: New favorite speed bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speed bag. I replaced my old everlast bag with this one. This bag is better balanced and has a truer return upon striking the platform. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K

customer_reviews.title: Meister speed bags
customer_reviews.text: This bag surpasses every other bag I've hit,it flat out fly and will test your ability and you'll be improving speed quickly,its got a big sweet spot and will last far past all the other bags,I bought the medium then soon after bought the smallest bag and I love them both.comparable quality bags would cost 50.-80 dollars. Try them ,GOOD LUCK DAN
customer_reviews.author: daniel zacha

customer_reviews.title: Great speed bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love this speed bag. My old Everlast bag blew out in less than a week. The Meister bag is very responsive and still going strong. U will have to add air every few days so keep a small hand pump close by.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this speedbag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. You’ll need to pump air in it every two weeks due to its small size ( I purchased the smallest one ) but it’s very smooth and is very effective. As for the pin, very tight so it’s a struggle to pull it out at first but you can place any house key in between to loosen it up just a tiny bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t offer reviews but I was compelled to do so based on the customer service I received. When I first got my speed bag it went flat immediately. I noticed the problem was in a defective bladder stem. I contacted Meister and immediately got a replacement sent out to me at no extra cost. The bag is great and I love the rebound effect of the bag during my workouts. The leather is smooth and comfortable to hit compared to the other bags I have purchased before. I definitely recommend this speed bag if you are in the market for one.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond diaz

customer_reviews.title: Well made Bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice Bag, It has a wide loop ..... good! but a tight fit on Masterlink for swivel, It is slower than the EverLast I use at the Gym. to compare I have tried different pressures.............
customer_reviews.author: Russell Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Absolute a quality Bag! I had a top rated Title that was 60 and this is way better all around.... I bought the medium and a small fit price of one title. AND it better period!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Higgs

customer_reviews.title: Love is in the air
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a young woman that my G-son had met. Yup she was a boxer also. How great that he met somebody that has the same passion for a sport. She uses it daily.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: great quality bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm 67,and have been using speed bag & heavy bag for many years. I use them to help stay in shape. I researched bags as my other wore out. I chose this bag & am glad I did . It is really well made. Got the small bag as it is faster. Wow!!! Best bag ever. I am not being comped for this review & rarely review products. Just a nice, nice bag. Worth it at twice the price. Don't believe the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: In the past I've only used cheap speed bags. The difference is clear after my first session with this speed bag im in love! If you like a fast bag, the small is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. I had 2 others and had issues with the bounce. After some research I got a new swivel, which helped but still lacking. The shell on this bag is extremely nice/soft and the bladder really made the bag faster.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: The Meister speed bag appears to be well made, and with strong stitching. It was easy to install, and should last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Silver49

customer_reviews.title: Great bag will buy again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag once i got the bag i spent 2 hours on this sucker and could have went longer but the bag works very well. UPDATE.... Still a great bag cant wait to get a smaller one buy this bag great purchase. The bag has great quality will purchase again once back in stock!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hydroxside

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Been using for several weeks and haven’t had any problems. Seems sturdy. Good bounce. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Great balance. Tough. Lasts.
customer_reviews.text: High-quality bag. Great balance. Don't insult it with a cheap or light-weight platform.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Q

customer_reviews.title: Good construction and value
customer_reviews.text: Great peanut bag although loses air after a week. Well built and nice leather.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Installed this and was very durable. Does not pop easily and works really well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with the everlast Speed Bag Platform. Works great! No leaks. Quality leather and stitching
customer_reviews.author: Trav

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speed bag. I tried 3 different ones and this one is by far the best quality I've seen so far. I'm glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: solitude

customer_reviews.title: The BEST bag on the market! Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further, this is the bag you want! I’ve tried Everlast and Title, and this bag blows them both out of the water. Premium leather construction, tight laces and perfectly balanced. I bought the medium bag and it is sweeeeet! Don’t waste your time searching. You’ll love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: CodyFord

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and returned it as it was not balanced at all and the bag was sloppy on the rebound. They sent me another one of the same and this one is awesome. Not sure what happened but they made up for it. Good product ❤️
customer_reviews.author: jose napoles

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Nice speed bag! Looks small at first but it will expand after time. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER L.

customer_reviews.title: Holding up very well, reasonable price, speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My husband and I use this speed bag for exercise. It's still new yet but holding up very well. Good price and speedy delivery
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Loosbrock

customer_reviews.title: Good speed bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice rebound, sturdy and doesn't hurt my hands 100% better than my old everlast.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas G.

customer_reviews.title: Good solid construction
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It's a little slow but I'm guessing that's because of the size. Will probably get the smaller one in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought the small bag and it’s perfect. Nice rebound nice material. I had a larger everlast which was a POS. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Luis R.

customer_reviews.title: Not only best value.it the best.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome.was almost goin to buy cleto reyes.but this right there with it.the leather is smooth and good quality.it has rivets on it.and the stitching is excellent.i wish this company made gloves with a minimalist like this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Close enough
customer_reviews.text: Loop at top is not inline with bag connection rivets so it hangs/moves slightly off axis. Besides that, the build quality is great and is aesthetically pleasing. I mean let's be honest you punch it so how perfect does it have to be really
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fast 5x7
customer_reviews.text: Let me start out by saying I have 26 different bags, all title and everlast. Most of the title bags are pretty good. But they're nothing compared to this. I have the 6x9 and two 5x7 bags. The 5x7 is the fastest bag I've ever had. Hands down. I'm trying to save everyone the trouble. Buy this bag. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ross shtayyeh

customer_reviews.title: Get it! It’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Had an issue but their customer care team took care of it promptly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pasha

customer_reviews.title: Great Proffesional Speedbag.
customer_reviews.text: i've had a few speed bags before and this one feels nice so far. Good feel to it and it has a nice tear drop shape to it. Hangs just right.
customer_reviews.author: J morris

customer_reviews.title: ROCK EM SOCK EM
customer_reviews.text: GET IT, BEAT, BANG IT, AND YOU WIFE WILL BE IMPRESSED.
customer_reviews.author: WSHODGE

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this speed bag. It’s fast and has held up very well to four months of of training six days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Pokechop75

customer_reviews.title: Priced right and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small size. It can take a beating and response great. Wish I heard about this brand a few bags ago.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag and it’s really good I recommend buying this item for Boxers or MMA fighters out there🥊. THANK YOU !!

customer_reviews.title: does not air
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold air...fill one day, after 2 dys of use, need to ad air..

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Thick strap. Finally a bag that doesnt rip off after a few workouts. We got the medium size and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, excellent product, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant customer service! There was a small snafu with the wrong item being sent first. Contacted the company, and they made it right immediately. Very satisfied. The product itself, is great. Very durable excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Howe

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but I still like it
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems really good but I’ve only had it a couple weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up, great deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't post reviews but this speedbag was so nice that I just had to post a review... Hands down the best speedbag I've ever used. This rebounds just as nice as an $80 bag. Two thumbs up, a definite buy!
customer_reviews.author: Trang T Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Pick the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Good bag but not for the novice. Remember, they offer different sizes. I love the smaller bag but you better have good bag work.
customer_reviews.author: Christian R.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is high quality and would recommend to anyone. I am very satisfied with this. There is a reason this product has all 5 stars (August 18, 2019).
customer_reviews.author: snowliving_

customer_reviews.title: Best speedbag
customer_reviews.text: I like that the bag is heavier than others. It allows to hit harder. These bags a very well balanced what makes the workout fun. I have now all tree sizes and I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sascha

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: GreT speed bag. Only complaint is it is a little heavier than a regular speed bag. Gets the job done though.
customer_reviews.author: MaverickLinville

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I just started using a speed bag, so granted I don't have much to compare it to. But I'm learning quickly, so the equipment must be helping out!
customer_reviews.author: Laura K Blessing

customer_reviews.title: Fast bag
customer_reviews.text: I have only owned 5 or 6 bags but this to me is great quality fast durable and tough and well worth the money my 2 sons have this bag in small and medium they retain air and are solid
customer_reviews.author: Raymond O.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get this one.
customer_reviews.text: After1.5 months it developed a slow leak. Of course, it’s outside of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: It holds air.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size for recreational use. I prefer a little smaller peanut bag for intense workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speed bag
customer_reviews.text: Much better bag compared to the Everlast bag that I used previously. Also, a little cheaper in price.

customer_reviews.title: Best Speed Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great product and works well. Small size took a few weeks to get timing down.

customer_reviews.title: Peanut speed bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck ! Cool lil peanut bag .I'm enjoying it alot
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Diala

customer_reviews.title: The best will always stand out
customer_reviews.text: Had to write a review on this punching bag by far the best hands down. You can see your speed and Precision I have used namebrand and none of them is more balance than this bag.
customer_reviews.author: E.B. KEYES

customer_reviews.title: Holds air pressure long term
customer_reviews.text: After buying multiple lower priced speed bags and having to pump them up with air mid workout I purchased this one. It is responsive and hold air pressure over a week of workouts.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is made poorly. The shape of the bag is off and has a bulge on one side. The loop is not centered but the bladder holds air and does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great bag at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 13 year old son as his first speed bag. I can hear him on it every night before he gets ready for bed. Success!
customer_reviews.author: Jason O.

customer_reviews.title: Really well made very impressed
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes about the bag was questioning a lil bit when i bought it but its really well made better than everlast its pretty fast over all nice bag
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Well made but has heavy feel.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is well made but slow. You will get a good workout if you are used to using a smaller sized bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking great leather holding the air , I bought the smallest it's heavy for the size

customer_reviews.title: SLOW!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a "speed" bag don't buy this one. It's very slow.

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: The bladder is solid, stitches tight, and it smells great. I could smell it all day, but would rather hit it.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Hokd air pretty good. 4 lbs seemed like ideal fill. Would recommend large size for beginners.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Only used it about 3 hours but has been pretty solid no complaints

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: We will be buying the other sizes as well !!!

customer_reviews.title: bag is quick and small
customer_reviews.text: love the speed and texture of this bag. provides a great feel and perfect workout

customer_reviews.title: Very very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this speed bag, and I'm a rather picky man!

customer_reviews.text: Quality. Solid construction. Much becher than the bag that came with the original set up.

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fantastic, very well balanced highly recommend this one

customer_reviews.title: Nice even bounce and holds air well.
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Title Atomic and this had a better feel. Nice even bounce and holds air well.

customer_reviews.title: speed bag
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. Its a speed bag. This one is a little bigger than Im used to but Im going to get another smaller one.... I love this one because being a littler bigger its a little slower but I can hit it harder... I love this bag... Oh.. And it holds air much longer than the last bag I had...

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with the performance of this bag--it's more of a 4.5 star rating. It does need to be inflated more regularly than I'd prefer. Overall, it's great bang for the buck.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag I use it everyday. I’ve only added a couple of pumps of air in several weeks of use. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: rip

product_meta.title: Meister SpeedKills Leather Speed Bag w/Lightweight Latex Bladder
product_meta.description:
Introducing the speed bag built for speed, durability and predictability: the Meister SpeedKills. Constructed from 100% genuine cowhide leather, this speed bag is built to take a beating and keep coming back.

The inner latex bladder provides for lighter and faster performance than traditional rubber bladders (Note: latex bladders need to be reinflated regularly). Each Meister Meister SpeedKills is produced and balanced by hand to ensure a symmetrical shape and predictable rebounds. Seams are reinforced for added durability.

SpeedKills are available in 3 sizes for different skill levels: Small (7.5" x 5") for experts. Medium (9.5" x 6") for intermediates. Large (10.5" x 7") for beginners. With a premium design and feel, this speed bag is the perfect addition to any gym or home. Step up to the best and start killing it!
feature_bullets: Genuine full-grain cowhide leather construction is built to last
Lightweight inner latex bladder provides faster performance
Balanced and centered for predictable and consistent rebounds
Simple premium design is a great addition to any gym or home
Available in Small (7.5" x 5"), Medium (9.5" x 6"), Large (10.5" x 7")
